doctor.name: Dr. Morsed Zaman Miah
doctor.specialty: Blood Diseases, Blood Cancer & Bone Marrow Transplant Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Morsed Zaman Miah is a Hematologist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS (RMC), MCPS (Pathology), FCPS (Hematology). He is working as a Blood Diseases, Blood Cancer & Bone Marrow Transplant Specialist doctor in Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Morsed Zaman Miah at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi is 3pm to 5pm (Closed: Mon & Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Mainuddin Ahmed
doctor.info: Dr. Mainuddin Ahmed is a Hematologist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS (Clinical Pathology), FCPS (Hematology). He worked as a Head of the Department (Hematology) in Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Fatema Hemato-oncology Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Mainuddin Ahmed at Fatema Hemato-oncology Center, Rajshahi is 2pm to 4pm & 7pm to 8.30pm.

chamber.address: Nikunja Bhaban, 18, Greater Road, Laxmipur, Rajshahi

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Maruf Al Hasan
doctor.specialty: Blood Diseases, Thalassemia & Blood Cancer Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Maruf Al Hasan is a Hematologist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS (RMC), BCS (Health), FCPS (Hematology), CCD (BIRDEM), MACP (USA). He is a Registrar, Hematology at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Maruf Al Hasan at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi is 4:30pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
